When Sophia's Starcaller enters, exile the top card of each player's library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play one of those cards and may use mana of any color to cast it. If you control another Wizard, you may play any number of those cards instead.
Conceptualize {1}{B} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its conceptualize cost. If you do, exile it when it enters the battlefield.)[/i]
